item.description:
THE TWELVE WEEKS OF WINTER COUNTDOWN EVENT

WHERE: Starbucks, Newburyport Center

WHEN: 2 hours starting at the posted time

WHERE TO MEET: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers.

DIRECTIONS: Route 1 north to signs for Downtown Newburyport. Starbucks is in the center. When you pull into town, huge free parking lots will be on your left along the harbor.

THE SCENE: Newburyport is beautiful at Christmas. Lights everywhere, in this already quaint New England destination center. After we paint, next door is the affordable The Grog restaurant. Casual, cozy, not crowded, and with a LIVE blues band down stairs.

OTHER:
IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

MEDIA: Unless you are accustomed to painting indoors in crowded conditions, it is recommended you stick to dry and/or simple media. Oils are not recommended because of their residue and fumes.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
item.name: 12 WEEKS OF WINTER COUNTDOWN: Newburyport, MA
